department: DEPT. OF PUBLIC WORKS AND GOV SERVICES
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement:
## M7594-222840 RCMP S4 Transformation (S4t) Professional Services

**Document Information:**

* Reference Number: WS3974445941-Doc3976190147
* Amendment Number: 7
* Solicitation Number: WS3974445941
* Publication Date: 2023-04-21
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-02T14:00:00

**Bidding Details:**

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Eligibility: This bid solicitation is open to TBIPS SA Holders holding a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 at the time of bid closing in the National Capital Region (NCR) Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs.

**Project Overview:**

* The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply.
* The project involves the provision of Informatics professional services to analyze, design, develop, and implement a new best-in-class finance and materiel management system solution that leverages the SAP S/4 HANA platform.
* The resulting contract will be for 2 years, with an option to extend for an additional year.

**Important Notice:**

* All bids submitted after 14:00 PM EDT on June 2, 2023, will be declared non-responsive.
* Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and BuyandSell posting closing time.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 2, 2023, at 14:00 PM EDT.

**Contact Information:**

* Contact Name: Patel, Ankoor (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: ankoor.patel@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Related Documents:**

* Visit the Ariba Discovery website for more information: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16067915?extsite=MTYwNjc5MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
